review: I like the way it works.
author: Stanton Sr.

review: Love it......great way to get extras without alot of extra money. Ordered the game remote as most of the games that say they can be played with the remote really can't - it's too hard.
author: lori neske

review: Love my fire stick.  I got rid of the dish bill and I was already a prime member so this is such a big plus for me.  I've had it a couple weeks now and still am finding fun things to watch.  So far I haven't missed dish at all.
author: tainsco

review: It was so easy to setup. It took about 5 min to get it setup and my son was watching a movie.  We were worried about the streaming since our XBox 360 used to freeze while watching netflix and considering it was on the 3rd floor where the router is on the 1st floor, but it didn't! I love Amazon's fast shipping!
author: Desiree

review: It,s was easy to install but the prime movies package had no up date movie
author: william a watkins

review: Easy to install.  Great user interface.  Love it!
author: Marie I.

review: I really like this Amazon Fire Stick.  I love watching shows on Amazon Prime and Netflix.  I also have Hulu Plus and this Amazon stick works great.
author: Cheryl P
